name: Mithrala Lifebane
aura: Increases Ally ACC in All Battles by 80.

skills.desc: Attacks 2 times at random. Each hit has an 80% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Libation of Pain
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a [Hex] debuff for 2 turns. Also places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Sigil of Toxic Glory

skills.desc: Removes all debuffs from all allies, then places a 25% [Strengthen] buff and a [Shield] buff equal to 30% of this Champion’s MAX HP on all allies for 2 turns.
skills.name: Brimming Cylix

skills.desc:
Whenever this Champion is attacked by an enemy under a [Hex] debuff, has a 50% chance of applying a [Petrification] debuff on the attacker for 1 turn. 

Whenever an ally is attacked by an enemy under a [Hex] debuff, has a 30% chance of applying a [Petrification] debuff on the attacker for 1 turn. 

Also increases this Champion’s RES. The amount by which it is increased is equal to the amount of ACC this Champion has.
skills.name: Gaze of Stone [P]
